meanings.definition: Relating to the sensory and neural mechanisms of hearing and balance.
meanings.sent1: The sensorineural test showed how well my ears and brain work together.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the sensorineural damage affected my ability to hear and stay balanced.
meanings.sent3: I never knew being sensorineural could make me feel like a walking gyroscope!
meanings.sent4: Her sensorineural perception of sound was like a finely tuned orchestra playing in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The vivid sensorineural experience of the concert left a lasting impression on her.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the nerves and sensory organs involved in hearing and balance.
meanings.sent1: The sensorineural issues in his ears affected his ability to hear properly.
meanings.sent2: The audiologist explained that the sensorineural hearing loss was due to damage in the inner ear.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her sensorineural ears were like high-maintenance divas demanding perfect balance.

meanings.sent5: The sensorineural sensitivity of his ears made him acutely aware of even the faintest sounds.
